blogPost.excerpt: Based on the AI technology, we train the system to remove scratches and restore the old family photographs in one click. It is difficult to repair damaged photos without advanced PhotoShop skills. But now, you can do it like a pro with 3 steps!
blogPost.body: Based on the AI technology, we train the system to remove scratches and restore the old family photographs in one click. It is difficult to repair damaged photos without advanced PhotoShop skills. But now, you can do it like a pro with 3 steps!
blogPost.title: Image Colorizer Repair - Repair old, damaged photographs and remove Scratches online
blogPost.author: Samuel alex 🔥

localize.description: 基于人工智能技术，训练系统一键去除划痕，还原家庭老照片。如果没有高超的PhotoShop技术，是很难修复受损照片的。但现在，你只需3步，就能像专业人员一样完成!
localize.tagline: 修复旧的，损坏的照片和去除划痕在线。

localize.description: 基於人工智能技術，訓練系統一鍵去除劃痕，還原家庭老照片。如果沒有高超的PhotoShop技術，是很難修復受損照片的。但現在，你只需3步，就能像專業人員一樣完成!
localize.tagline: 修復舊的，損壞的照片和去除劃痕在線。

previous.excerpt: Aqueux is a collection of ultra high-resolution dynamic wallpapers, inspired by an OS X classic — available in several wide-gamut color editions, with easy installation on macOS, and a free set available for mobile devices.
previous.title: Aqueux Wallpapers - A collection of dynamic wallpapers, for desktop and mobile

localize.description: Aqueux是一个超高分辨率动态壁纸的集合，灵感来自于OS X的经典之作--有几个宽广的gamut颜色版本，可在macOS上轻松安装，并为移动设备提供免费套装。
localize.tagline: 一系列动态壁纸，适用于桌面和手机。

localize.description: Aqueux是一個超高分辨率動態壁紙的集合，靈感來自於OS X的經典之作--有幾個寬廣的gamut顏色版本，可在macOS上輕鬆安裝，併爲移動設備提供免費套裝。
localize.tagline: 一系列動態壁紙，適用於桌面和手機。

next.excerpt: Most users don't trust written reviews anymore. We built a platform for businesses to collect audio reviews from customers - adding an unmistakable touch of authenticity.
next.title: Howlr - Record audio reviews from customers.

localize.description: 大多数用户已经不相信书面评论了。我们为企业搭建了一个收集客户音频评论的平台--为企业增加了一丝真实性。
大多數用戶已經不相信書面評論了。我們爲企業搭建了一個收集客戶音頻評論的平臺--爲企業增加了一絲真實性。
